name: Gaian Rampart
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You create a 10 foot tall stone obelisk at target location within range. It has AC 16, 120 hit points, and resistance to slashing and piercing damage.

If another obelisk is within 60 feet, an impenetrable barrier of force interwoven with multicolored stones forms between the two obelisks. Only creatures you choose can pass through the barrier.

Any number of obelisks, either created by you or another creature, can be connected, so long as the resultant barriers do not intersect each other.
